title: University Hosts Annual Science Fair
content: The University of Bahrain hosted its annual science fair, showcasing innovative projects from students across various disciplines.
author: Dr. Omar Al-Khatib

title: New AI Lab Opens on Campus
content: A state-of-the-art AI lab has been inaugurated to support research and development in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

content: A team of engineering students has won an international award for their eco-friendly water purifier project.

content: Join us for a day of innovation as students present their groundbreaking projects and ideas.
